lead_paragraph: While the rest of the country mostly talks of doing something about affirmative action programs, opponents and proponents of such plans in California are moving rapidly to action. Legislative bills have been drawn. Petitions are being readied. Fund-raising appeals have been mailed. Political consultants are being hired. Television advertisements are being filmed. Grass-roots coalitions are forming and holding rallies.
